Product Features

A set of 2 decks of playing cards designed at the AGH University and made by the Trefl Playing Card Company with card game enthusiasts in mind. Classical figures on the obverse, an AGH University graphic on the reverse and the box. Decks consist of 55 cards, size 58 x 88 mm, weight of 300 grams. Perfect for bridge (100% symmetrical), poker, rummy, canasta, as well as other games.
ECO-FRIENDLY GAME – the transparent packaging material is fully compostable. Remember to throw it in the bio-waste bin.

Product description
2 decks in a box with a logotype
numer of cards in a deck: 55 
size of the box: 15 x 10,5 cm
weight of the cards: 300 grams 
paper cards with matte coating
